alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN PASCO... NORTHWESTERN PINELLAS AND NORTHWESTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palm Harbor, or near Holiday. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Clearwater, New Port Richey, Holiday, Palm Harbor, Beacon Square, East Lake, Citrus Park, Keystone, Safety Harbor, Oldsmar, Westchase, Crystal Beach, Elfers, Honeymoon Island, and Trinity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
